text: Los Alegres de Terán (traducted to English: The Cheerfuls of Teran) was a Mexican norteño music group from General Terán, Nuevo León. It was formed in the mid-1940s by Eugenio Abrego and Tomas Ortiz, they were originally located in Monterrey, although in 1960 they would move to McAllen, Texas. The greatest successes of the group would be: "Carta Jugada", "Alma Enamorada", and "Entre Copa y Copa". == References == Category:Mexican musical groups
title: Los Alegres de Terán
